title: Kiefer Sutherland
summary: Kiefer William Frederick Dempsey George Rufus Sutherland[2] (born 21 December 1966)[3] is a British-born Canadian actor, producer, director, and singer. He is best known for his starring role as Jack Bauer[4] in the Fox drama series 24 (2001â€“2010, 2014), for which he won an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and two Satellite Awards.
